title: Analyze accum function g with geometric graph, f part - c

content.description: The graph of the function f shown above consists of a semicircle and three line segments. Let g be the function given by <math> <mrow> <mi>g</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mi>x</mi> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </math>.
content.question: Find the absolute minimum value of g on the closed interval [-5, 4]. Justify your answer.
